children.value: To create an IP List, follow these steps:
Enter a name for your list, observing the following guidelines:
Use only lowercase letters, numbers and the underscore (
) character in the name. A valid name satisfies this regular expression:
The maximum length for a list name is 50 characters.
Use a descriptive name for your list so that the list is informative in the context of a Firewall Rule expression.
Enter a description (optional). The maximum length for the description is 500 characters. There are no character constraints for the description field.
To populate your list, refer to
Use IP Lists: Add items to a list
You can only delete a list when there are no Firewall Rules (enabled or disabled) that reference the list.
To delete an IP List, follow these steps:
In the Cloudflare dashboard, navigate to
button associated with the list you want to delete.
When the list is used in a Firewall Rule, a tooltip displays with notification that you cannot delete the list:
When the list is not used in a Firewall Rule,
link highlights, indicating you can delete the list.
card displays the updated collection of lists.
You can add and remove items from a list, but you cannot change the list name or type.
Use IP Lists: Manage IP List items
